DeSoto.Inspiring Body of Christ Church: The Inspiring Body of Christ Church (IBOC) is a non-denominational megachurch in Dallas, Texas, USA. The pastor is Rickie G. Rush. A survey by Outreach Magazine in 2008 ranked the church 87th in the USA based on weekly attendance of 7,500. The church describes itself as a "high praising, high worship, Bible believing church".
